title: T206 Lot of 17 - Brenahan, McGraw, Titus, Demmitt, etc -SOLD-
author: ATP

posts.post_title: T206 Lot of 17 - Brenahan, McGraw, Titus, Demmitt, etc -SOLD-
posts.post_content: Selling this lot of 17 T206 cards shown in the scans below.  Varying condition, a couple nice looking Hall of Famers with Brenahan and McGraw.  Some tougher commons like Titus, Demmitt, and Paskert.  $400 delivered.  PM if interested.
Are you open to selling the cards individually?
Bump.  Taking offers on the lot for those who may be interested.  Thanks for looking.
